page.title: 07GUITING POWER.VILLAGE HALL
page.content: Our Village Hall is run by a Committee made up of one representative from each club and organisation which uses the Hall. These include Gardening,Cricket, Football and Youth Clubs, the Cheery Club for over-60s,Day Centre for the elderly of the neighbourhood,Brownies, Women's Institute,Playgroup,Badminton Club and School. The Committee looks after painting,cleaning,heating,grasscutting and the garden. They get fees from Clubs,School,Music Festival,wedding and birthday parties. The School use the hall for P.E., drama and the Christmas concert and party. The Doctor holds a weekly surgery. There is a Music Festival and Art Exhibition every July. The Hall is 24 years old.
